response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me due to its unique features and craftsmanship. I understand it might be a substantial investment, but I believe its worth far exceeds its price. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you for $12,000. I trust this price reflects both the value of the product and the opportunity for us to collaborate. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
